医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明癌症如何自私地劫持有用的免疫途径进行扩散由纪念斯隆凯特琳癌症中心 (MSK) 和威尔康奈尔医学院的研究人员领导的一项研究发现了癌细胞与免疫系统之间的新关系，并表明癌症如何自私地劫持通常有用的免疫途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Study-shows-how-cancer-can-selfishly-hijack-a-helpful-immune-pathway-to-spread.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Study-shows-how-cancer-can-selfishly-hijack-a-helpful-immune-pathway-to-spread.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f375850c-ce74-4504-8f6f-5629abccd83d Wed, 23 Aug 2023 23:19:00 -0400 Study shows how cancer can selfishly hijack a helpful immune pathway to spread
新的靶向疗法 zolbetuximab 可延长晚期胃癌患者的生存期威尔康奈尔医学院和纽约长老会医院参与的一项国际 3 期临床试验发现，一种名为 zolbetuximab 的新靶向治疗与标准化疗联合使用，可以延长晚期胃癌或胃食管交界癌患者的生存期，这些患者过度表达特定的生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/New-targeted-therapy-zolbetuximab-extends-survival-for-病人-with-advanced-gastric-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/New-targeted-therapy-zolbetuximab-extends-survival-for-病人-with-advanced-gastric-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42a22f59-7bda-4d1a-b5ed-f8c023e6f18e Wed, 23 Aug 2023 23:08:41 -0400 New targeted therapy zolbetuximab extends survival for patients with advanced gastric cancer
糖尿病药物通过刺激身体产生醚脂来延长寿命二甲双胍是治疗 2 型糖尿病最常用的药物，不仅可以降低血糖水平，而且可以延长线虫的寿命，线虫是一种与人类具有相似代谢系统的动物模型，通常用于模拟人类疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Diabetes-drug-promotes-longevity-by-stimulate-the-bodys-products-of-ether-lipids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Diabetes-drug-promotes-longevity-by-stimulate-the-bodys-products-of-ether-lipids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1363b92-bd5e-4a57-b06c-15d3b62919de Wed, 23 Aug 2023 22:56:29 -0400 Diabetes drug promotes longevity by stimulating the body's production of ether lipids
气候困扰会导致英国年轻人产生负面情绪，但可能会促使他们采取行动伦敦帝国学院和昆士兰大学的一个研究小组发表的一项新研究报告称，气候变化带来的困扰给英国年轻人带来了很多负面情绪，但也可能激励他们为环境采取积极行动。 8 月 23 日发表在开放获取期刊 PLOS Global Public Health 上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Climate-distress-causes-negative-emotions-among-UK-youth-but-may-motivate-action.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Climate-distress-causes-negative-emotions-among-UK-youth-but-may-motivate-action.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b77bd742-38d4-4b5a-be57-7949b79294d8 Wed, 23 Aug 2023 22:46:04 -0400 Climate distress causes negative emotions among UK youth, but may motivate action
加州大学研究人员研究引起恰加斯病的寄生虫几乎所有关于接吻虫的昆虫都令人反感，从它们在晚上咬人的脸、在睡觉时喝他们的血的阴险方式，到它们通过粪便传播疾病的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/UC-researchers-study-parasite-that-c​​auses-Chagas-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/UC-researchers-study-parasite-that-c​​auses-Chagas-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d84623a9-b4be-4d17-9020-408b704348e8 Wed, 23 Aug 2023 22:40:58 -0400 UC researchers study parasite that causes Chagas disease
裸鼹鼠基因促进小鼠健康和长寿罗切斯特大学的研究人员进行了一项开创性的努力，成功地将裸鼹鼠的长寿基因转移到小鼠身上，从而改善了小鼠的健康状况并延长了小鼠的寿命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Naked-mole-rat-gene-boosts-health-and-longevity-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Naked-mole-rat-gene-boosts-health-and-longevity-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9997d30-b730-48ed-9188-4403fd868d70 Wed, 23 Aug 2023 21:46:06 -0400 Naked mole rat gene boosts health and longevity in mice
与多发性硬化症记忆功能障碍相关的脑部病变与记忆回路有关30% 至 50% 的多发性硬化症 (MS) 患者会出现记忆问题，但原因尚不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Brain-lesions- Associated-with-MS-memory-dysfunction-connect-to-a-memory-Circuit.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Brain-lesions- Associated-with-MS-memory-dysfunction-connect-to-a-memory-Circuit.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ff27a86-75c1-4c4c-975d-f​​5f944a8020f Wed, 23 Aug 2023 21:29:26 -0400 Brain lesions associated with MS memory dysfunction connect to a memory circuit
在非洲血统的人中发现与帕金森病相关的新基因变异一项对近 198,000 名具有这种遗传背景的参与者进行的国际研究表明，几乎只在非洲血统人群的基因组中发现的一种基因变异会增加患帕金森病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/New-gene-variant-linked-to-Parkinsons-disease-found-in-people-of-African-ancestry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/New-gene-variant-linked-to-Parkinsons-disease-found-in-people-of-African-ancestry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=842ed590-a940-4713-b330-d2a02c7be30e Wed, 23 Aug 2023 21:14:49 -0400 New gene variant linked to Parkinson's disease found in people of African ancestry
瑞典研究改变了乳腺癌基因检测的国家指南BRCA1 和 BRCA2 是众所周知的乳腺癌基因，与遗传性乳腺癌和卵巢癌风险显着增加相关。然而，还有另外十一个基因与这些类型的癌症风险升高相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Swedish-study-changes-national-guidelines-for-genic-testing-in-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Swedish-study-changes-national-guidelines-for-genic-testing-in-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=439f4ac5-4631-47c3-8a9e-2f160c739510 Wed, 23 Aug 2023 20:57:24 -0400 Swedish study changes national guidelines for genetic testing in breast cancer
格里菲斯正处于疫苗开发技术突破的边缘格里菲斯大学的研究人员正处于疫苗开发技术突破的边缘，可能会出现一种新的疫苗模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Griffith-on-the-brink-of-technological-breakthrough-in-vaccine-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230823/Griffith-on-the-brink-of-technological-breakthrough-in-vaccine-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d112250-4777-4f69-b005-f9ea8cdc16f7 Wed, 23 Aug 2023 20:46:30 -0400 Griffith on the brink of technological breakthrough in vaccine development
